Article Title: 'Babar Azam should never have been compared to Virat Kohli' – Former Pakistan cricketer
Article Text:
Virat Kohli and Babar Azam

Explained: Why The India-Pakistan Asia Cup Clash Cannot Be Cancelled Despite Backlash

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!



Poll Should players be compared to legends like Virat Kohli? Yes, it motivates them No, it adds unnecessary pressure

Former Pakistan batter Ahmed Shehzad has come out strongly against the trend of comparing players, particularly Babar Azam , with modern-day great Virat Kohli . Speaking in an interview, Shehzad said that such comparisons are not only unfair but also add unnecessary pressure on players, which is visible in Babar’s current struggles.“When everything was going well, you were running campaigns comparing players. Now that the performances are not coming, you are saying ‘don’t compare two players’. Why not? Virat Kohli ’s comparison cannot be made with anyone in the world. He is a legend of this generation, a role model. You cannot compare him even with MS Dhoni . Dhoni may have been a great captain, but as a batter, cricketer, and athlete, Kohli stands alone. No one should be compared with anyone because it’s unfair and it adds extra pressure, which we are now seeing on Babar Azam,” Shehzad said.Babar’s dip in form has been a talking point for months. He has now gone 72 consecutive international innings without scoring a century, with his last hundred coming against Nepal. Since 2023, no other cricketer has endured a longer drought without a century.Adding to that, since 2024, Babar and Mohammad Rizwan are the only two batters from full-member nations with a strike rate below 80.The struggles have coincided with a change in leadership. Babar is no longer Pakistan’s captain across formats, having stepped down earlier this year following criticism over results and his own performances. The recent ODI series against West Indies only intensified the scrutiny, as Pakistan suffered a 202-run loss to concede their first bilateral ODI series to the Caribbean side in 34 years.Shehzad’s remarks highlight the pressure top players face when placed on the same pedestal as legends, and why the weight of public comparisons can often prove damaging to form and confidence.
Article Summary: Former pakistan batter ahmed shehzad has come out strongly against the trend of comparing players, particularly babar azam, with modern-day great virat kohli. He said that such comparisons are not only unfair but also add unnecessary pressure on players, which is visible in babar’s current struggles.

Article Title: Arjun Tendulkar engaged to Saaniya Chandok – What’s the net worth of her family’s business empire?
Article Text:
Saaniya Chandok with Sara Tendulkar (X)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!



Arjun Tendulkar, son of cricket great Sachin Tendulkar , is set to marry Saaniya Chandok, the granddaughter of Mumbai businessman Ravi Ghai. The couple’s engagement was held in a private ceremony attended by close friends and family.Saaniya comes from a family deeply rooted in India’s food and hospitality sector. The Ghai family runs the Graviss Group, which owns The Brooklyn Creamery and manages Baskin Robbins’ India operations. While The Brooklyn Creamery’s standalone net worth is not disclosed, Graviss Food Solutions Private Limited, the parent company, posted ₹624 crore in revenue for FY23-24, marking a 20% growth from the previous year. The company has an authorised capital of ₹2.23 crore and a paid-up capital of ₹90,100.Mr. Paws Pet Spa & Store LLP, where Saaniya serves as Designated Partner and Director, is a smaller venture launched in 2022 with an authorised capital of ₹0.10 million. It remains a modest business compared to the group’s larger brands.The Ghai family also operates the InterContinental hotel in Mumbai under the umbrella of InterContinental Hotels Group, a publicly traded multinational valued at $18.43 billion as of August 2025.Despite negative net assets due to liabilities, IHG maintains a strong market valuation globally.While the business numbers highlight the scale of Saaniya’s family enterprises, Arjun continues to carve his name in cricket. The left-arm pacer plays domestic cricket for Goa and has featured in the IPL for Mumbai Indians . He began his professional journey with Mumbai in the 2020/21 season before moving to Goa, where he has impressed in both First-Class and List A formats.The engagement has drawn warm attention from fans and well-wishers, blending cricket legacy with business prominence.
Article Summary: Arjun tendulkar is set to marry saaniya chandok. Chandok is the granddaughter of mumbai businessman ravi ghai. Ghai family runs the graviss group, which owns the brooklyn creamery and manages baskin robbins’ india operations.

Article Title: Arjun Tendulkar, son of Sachin Tendulkar, gets engaged Saaniya Chandok in private ceremony
Article Text:
Arjun Tendulkar (third from left) with Saaniya Chandok (second from left) in a social media photo. (Image: X)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!



Arjun Tendulkar, the 25-year-old son of cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar , has gotten engaged to Saaniya Chandok in a private ceremony attended by close friends and family members, said media reports. Saaniya is the granddaughter of prominent Mumbai industrialist Ravi Ghai, whose family owns the InterContinental hotel and Brooklyn Creamery ice cream company.The engagement ceremony was an intimate affair with attendance limited to close friends and relatives from both families. Neither the Tendulkar nor the Ghai families have made any official statements regarding the engagement.Saaniya Chandok comes from one of Mumbai's prominent business families and is known for maintaining a low public profile. Her family has established themselves in the food and hospitality sectors through their ownership of significant business ventures.Arjun Tendulkar, a left-arm fast bowling all-rounder, currently represents Goa in domestic cricket and has played for the Mumbai Indians in the Indian Premier League (IPL). His cricket career began with junior cricket in Mumbai, followed by selection to the India U19 team.His domestic cricket journey started in the 2020-21 season when he made his T20 debut against Haryana while playing for Mumbai.He later moved to Goa for the 2022-2023 season, where he made his List A and first-class cricket debuts.In his red-ball cricket career, Arjun has participated in 17 matches, claiming 37 wickets. His bowling achievements include one five-wicket haul and two four-wicket hauls. With the bat, he has accumulated 532 runs, including one century and two half-centuries.His List A cricket statistics for Goa show 17 matches played, with 76 runs scored in nine innings. In the IPL, representing Mumbai Indians, Arjun has played five games, bowling 73 deliveries and taking three wickets at an average of 38.00, with his best bowling figures being 1/9.His IPL bowling statistics reflect a strike rate of 24.3 and an economy rate of 9.36. His batting opportunities in the IPL have been limited, with a highest score of 13 runs, coming from nine balls at a strike rate of 144.44.
Article Summary: Arjun tendulkar, 25, has gotten engaged to saaniya chandok. The engagement ceremony was an intimate affair with attendance limited to close friends and relatives from both families. Chandok is the granddaughter of prominent mumbai industrialist ravi ghai, whose family owns the intercontinental hotel and brooklyn creamery ice cream company.

Article Title: Arjun Tendulkar gets engaged to Saaniya Chandok; who is she?

Saaniya Chandok with Sara Tendulkar and Arjun Tendulkar.

Her family owns well-known ventures in the food and hospitality sector, including the InterContinental hotel and Brooklyn Creamery ice cream brand. Known for keeping a low profile, Saaniya comes from one of Mumbai’s most recognisable business families.Neither the Tendulkar nor the Ghai families have issued an official statement about the engagement. The event remained an intimate celebration, reflecting the private nature of both families. Arjun is a left-arm fast bowling all-rounder who currently plays for Goa in domestic cricket. He has also represented the Mumbai Indians in the Indian Premier League. His cricket journey began in Mumbai’s junior circuits before he earned a place in the India U19 team.He made his T20 debut in the 2020-21 season for Mumbai against Haryana and later moved to Goa in 2022-23, where he debuted in both List A and first-class cricket.In red-ball matches, he has played 17 games, taken 37 wickets and scored 532 runs, which include one century and two fifties. In List A cricket, he has featured in 17 matches, scoring 76 runs and contributing with the ball.In the IPL, Arjun has played five matches for Mumbai Indians, taking three wickets and showing glimpses of his ability with both bat and ball.The engagement has drawn warm wishes from fans, marking a personal milestone for the young cricketer alongside his growing sporting career.

Her family owns well-known ventures in the food and hospitality sector, including the intercontinental hotel and brooklyn creamery ice cream brand. Article Title: Brock Lesnar's net worth in 2025, current WWE salary, contract status, upcoming matches, and more
Article Text:
(Image via X)

Brock Lesnar's net worth in 2025

Brock Lesnar Full Match Compilation

Earnings and WWE salary

Brock Lesnar’s contract status

Brock Lesnar is BACK and CRUSHES John Cena with an F-5: SummerSlam 2025 highlights

Upcoming matches

Also Read

Brock Lesnar is considered one of the most dominant forces in WWE and UFC history, who is continuing to reign over the wrestling industry. The 48-year-old, who was away from the wrestling scene, has returned recently after a long hiatus at the recently held WWE SummerSlam 2025. As the wrestler’s return has become the talk of the town, let us look at Lesnar’s net worth, current WWE salary, contract status, upcoming matches, and more.After returning to the ring at the recently held WWE SummerSlam, almost after 2 years, Brock Lesnar’s net worth in 2025 stands strong at $20 million, according to Celebrity Net Worth. This figure remains steady from 2024, despite the controversy with the highly publicized Janel Grant lawsuit.His massive pay-per-view bouts in both WWE and UFC, long-term sponsorships, merchandise royalties, and bonus clauses have collectively built a financial empire. His endorsement deals with brands like Dymatize Nutrition, Jimmy John’s, and his fitness label, DeathClutch, continues to supplement his income even during his hiatus. Besides, Lesnar’s WWE salary is around $5 million per year.Brock Lesnar is still working with WWE, and his contract has not been revoked in recent years.According to Dave Meltzer in the latest issue of the Wrestling Observer Newsletter, Lesnar was never suspended by the company and was fully paid during his two years away from WWE. Making him one of the highest-paid wrestlers in the company to sit at home and do nothing.After The Beast Incarnate appeared on WWE SummerSlam, it is expected that the WWE star will feature in another upcoming match with John Cena, who is currently on his farewell tour. Reports suggest that the showdown between John and Brock is set to take place during the huge event to be held in Australia in mid-October. Will that be John Cena’s last retirement match? Only time will tell.
Article Summary: Brock lesnar's net worth in 2025 stands strong at $20 million, according to celebrity net worth. The 48-year-old wwe star is still working with wwe, and his contract has not been revoked in recent years. It is expected that the beast incarnate will feature in another upcoming match with john cena, who is currently on his farewell tour.

Article Title: Joy Taylor opens up for the first time about being fired by FOX Sports and the ongoing scandalous lawsuit
Article Text:
Joy Taylor has opened up about getting fired.(Image via Joy Taylor/Instagram)

Joy Taylor opens up about getting “fired” from FOX Sports amid dealing with the scandalous lawsuit



What’s Next for Joy Taylor After Leaving Fox Sports?

Why was Joy Taylor sued along with Charlie Dixon and Emmanuel Acho?

Joy Taylor, the former Fox Sports’ executive, has had a pretty tough year after she got involved in a scandalous legal lawsuit earlier this year. While the lawsuit is ongoing, Joy Taylor continued on with her job at Fox Sports’ Speak which she co-hosted with Keyshawn Johnson and Paul Pierce. But just a few weeks back, Joy Taylor was fired by FOX Sports and now, she has broken her silence on it.A few days back, former FOX Sports executive, Joy Taylor appeared on the 'Hot Mics with Billy Bush' show, where she spoke about her lawsuit and getting fired from FOX Sports.When Joy Taylor was asked about the legal mess, she said, "Well, it's still an ongoing legal situation, so I can't comment on that. I will have something to say about it…when I can legally.”However, Joy Taylor strongly denied any connection between her lawsuit and getting fired from FOX Sports.The former FOX Sports executive added, "I will say that that situation and that suit had nothing to do with the changes that happened at FS1. I mean, I think from a logical standpoint, everyone can just look at it and see what the changes were and that there were three shows that were cut."For the unversed, earlier this year, Joy Taylor, Charlie Dixon and Emmanuel Acho had found themselves in a huge legal mess.Former FOX Sports’ employee Noushin Faraji had filed a lawsuit against them for “sexual misconduct”.As per the lawsuit filed by Noushin Faraji, apparently, Charlie Dixon had tried to get close to her even though she rejected his advances. This led Noushin Faraji to approach Joy Taylor but Taylor allegedly told her not to complain about it and “to get over it”.This allegedly led Noushin Faraji to uncover ongoing “inappropriate workplace sexual relationships” at FOX Sports. Noushin Faraji alleged that Joy Taylor also had such inappropriate relationship to “advance” in her career.Noushin Faraji ended up accusing Charlie Dixon of sexual battery and filed a lawsuit against Joy Taylor.However, Joy Taylor has strongly denied such claims and continues to maintain she is innocent. There have been no updates on the lawsuit in public yet even though Joy Taylor has been fired.Also Read: “No means no”: Shannon Sharpe’s accuser 20-year-old OnlyFans model alleged that he sexually assaulted her without wearing a condom
Article Summary: Joy taylor, the former fox sports’ executive, has had a tough year after she got involved in a scandalous legal lawsuit earlier this year. While the lawsuit is ongoing, joy taylor continued on with her job at fox sports' speak which she co-hosted with keyshawn johnson and paul pierce.

Article Text:

Why This Matters for the Los Angeles Lakers

The Odds of This Trade Happening

Thecould be preparing for another bold roster shake-up, with reports suggesting the team may explore a trade that sendsto the Sacramento Kings in exchange for forwardand guard. The move would aim to build a more balanced lineup around newly-extended superstar Luka Doncic and NBA legend LeBron James.On August 2, the Los Angeles Lakers officially committed to a new era by signing Doncic to a three-year, $165 million contract extension. Now, with two of the league’s best playmakers on the floor, General Manager Rob Pelinka may look to complement them with versatile two-way talent rather than another ball-dominant guard. Austin Reaves delivered a career year in the 2024-25 season, showcasing his scoring and playmaking ability. However, his lack of defensive presence could make him a less-than-ideal fit alongside Doncic over a full season.Rishav Bhat of ClutchPoints noted the potential reasoning behind a move for Keegan Murray, writing: “Despite Murray being one of the brightest young players the Kings have, he has emerged as a trade candidate because he is also one of the only remaining trade assets on their roster.At 24 years old and on a modest $11.1 million salary, Murray offers rare upside, strong defense, secondary scoring, and a team-friendly contract that the Kings can make use of in pursuit of a bigger star. ”If the Kings seek a replacement for point guard De’Aaron Fox - traded to the San Antonio Spurs last season - Austin Reaves could fill that role. For the Los Angeles Lakers , Keegan Murray and Keon Ellis would bring complementary skills that could fit seamlessly with Doncic and James.The 6-foot-8 forward has emerged as one of Sacramento’s most promising young players. His combination of size, defensive versatility, and efficient scoring could help stabilize the Los Angeles Lakers’ frontcourt.Ellis, a 6-foot-6 undrafted shooting guard, became one of Sacramento’s breakout performers in 2024-25. His elite three-point shooting and defensive instincts make him an appealing target for Los Angeles.Ellis’ defensive rating and ability to stretch the floor could make him the ideal backcourt partner for Doncic, who thrives alongside high-efficiency shooters and defensive-minded guards.• Fit with Stars: Doncic and James already provide elite playmaking, so adding players who excel off the ball and on defense could balance the roster.• Defensive Boost: Murray and Ellis both offer strong defensive metrics, something the Lakers need after recent struggles on that end.• Youth and Upside: At 24 and 25, Murray and Ellis align with a long-term approach while still being ready to contribute immediately.Also read: NBA Trade News: Denver Nuggets Sign $578,577 Dallas Mavericks Rookie to Bolster Wing Depth and Improve Championship Odds While the concept makes sense for both sides in theory, there’s no indication talks are active. The Kings may be hesitant to part with Murray, while the Los Angeles Lakers could weigh whether moving on from Austin Reaves is worth the risk. Still, as the Lakers look to maximize Doncic’s prime years, surrounding him with versatile, defensive-minded talent may become a necessity sooner rather than later.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers could be preparing for another bold roster shake-up. Reports suggest the team may explore a trade that sendsto the sacramento kings in exchange for forwardand guard. The move would aim to build a more balanced lineup around newly-extended superstar luka doncic and nba legend lebron james.

Article Title: NBA wives showdown: Vanessa Bryant vs. La La Anthony net worth 2025 compared
Article Text:
NBA wives showdown: Vanessa Bryant vs. La La Anthony net worth 2025 compared (Image Credit: Getty Images)

What is Vanessa Bryant’s net worth in 2025?

What is La La Anthony’s net worth in 2025?

The NBA world extends beyond the confines of the court, where there is a huge focus on the women who are firmly beside the basketball icons. Two of those top women in 2025 are Vanessa Bryant and La La Anthony. Apart from being the wives of legendary players, Kobe Bryant and Carmelo Anthony, respectively, they have built their own fortune with resilience and persistence, so it is interesting to see who leads the charge in terms of net worth.Vanessa Bryant is the widow of NBA legend Kobe Bryant, who passed away in a tragic helicopter crash in 2020. After his passing, Vanessa took the reins of her family and carried forward his legacy in her own way. According to Celebrity Net Worth, her financial standing as of now is estimated to be $600 million.The majority of the wealth came from the inheritance of Kobe Bryant’s estate, including paychecks from the NBA, investments, and endorsement deals with brands like McDonald's and Nike. One of the top investments that fetched major returns was in Body Armor. After Coca-Cola purchased it for $5.6 billion, Vanessa’s earnings shot up to $400 million alone from that one deal, while legal settlements from deals also added another $28 million to her fortune.Apart from these, Vanessa runs the Granity Studios as President and CEO, producing content to honor Kobe Bryant’s legacy, and also launched the Mambacita clothing line, which supports young players through her foundation, Mambacita Sports Foundation. She is also involved in philanthropic endeavors and has proven herself to be a smart and successful businesswoman apart from being a NBA legend’s wife.According to multiple sources like AfroTech and Sportskeeda, the wife of Carmelo Anthony, La La Anthony, has amassed a great fortune. As of now, her net worth is estimated to be $30 million. She began her career as a Video Jockey with MTV and starred in shows like The Chi, and BMF. As a VJ, La La Anthony has hosted marquee events like 2025 Met Gala.Anthony also has her own cosmetic line named Motives and clothing lines, La La Anthony, and 5th & Mercer. Some other sources of income for La La include active brand endorsement deals like Airbnb and publishing best sellers. Overall, she has been a great blend of a top-notch businesswoman, television personality, and a celebrity in her own right.In conclusion, while both NBA wives have thrived in their respective lives, Vanessa Bryant’s net worth transcends La Anthony's. Yet, both continue to make significant strides walking down their own path and becoming highly successful today.Also read: NBA Trade Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers Could Target $45 Million Boston Celtics Forward to Support Luka Doncic and LeBron James
Article Summary: Vanessa bryant is the widow of nba legend kobe bryant, who passed away in 2020. According to celebrity net worth, her financial standing as of now is estimated to be $600 million. The wife of carmelo anthony, la la anthony, has amassed a great fortune. She began her career as a video jockey with mtv and starred in shows like the chi.

Article Title: 'F*ggot of the Day': Antonio Brown fuels outrage with offensive remark about Vikings’ male cheerleader amid fan controversy
Article Text:
Antonio Brown has stirred fresh controversy after targeting one of the Vikings’ newly appointed male cheerleaders (Getty Images)

Vikings ’ inclusion of male cheerleaders sparks mixed reactions from fanbase

Antonio Brown’s history of polarizing behavior overshadows preseason buzz



Former NFL wide receiver Antonio Brown has stirred fresh controversy after publicly targeting one of the Minnesota Vikings’ newly appointed male cheerleaders. The incident comes at a time when the team’s decision to add male performers to its cheer squad has already divided fans, sparking discussions about tradition, inclusivity, and the evolving culture of the NFL.The Vikings recently confirmed that Blaize Shiek and Louie Conn would join their cheerleading roster for the 2025 season. The decision was presented as a step toward gender equality and representation within the organization, aligning with a growing trend of NFL teams adopting co-ed cheer squads.While many supporters applauded the move as progressive, others pushed back, arguing it clashed with long-standing game-day traditions. Some season ticket holders reportedly went as far as threatening to cancel their memberships over the change. This divide existed well before Antonio Brown’s remarks but has now been amplified by the former wideout’s public criticism, in which he tweeted, “F*ggot of the Day” alongside a video of Shiek.Antonio Brown, who enjoyed a 12-season NFL career and a Super Bowl victory, has built a reputation for courting controversy both during and after his playing days.His latest jab comes just as the Vikings have kicked off their preseason with a 20-10 win over the Houston Texans. The team is now preparing to face the New England Patriots and Tennessee Titans before opening their regular season against the Chicago Bears on September 8.Much of the preseason focus had been on the return of rookie quarterback J.J. McCarthy from a season-ending injury last year. However, Brown’s comments have shifted the conversation from on-field performance to a broader cultural clash.Also Read: “Overhyped and overrated”: Josh Allen’s wife Hailee Steinfeld faces harsh criticism from Dave Portnoy For many observers, the situation underscores the resistance that often accompanies change in sports culture. While the NFL has slowly embraced greater diversity in its cheer leading programs, incidents like this reveal that acceptance is still far from universal—and that progress will likely continue to face pushback from some corners of the sport.The Vikings aren't alone in adding men to their cheer squads. According to The Spun, 12 NFL teams will have male cheerleaders on the field this season, up from seven in 2024.
Article Summary: Former nfl wide receiver antonio brown has stirred fresh controversy after publicly targeting one of the minnesota vikings’ newly appointed male cheerleaders. The vikings recently confirmed that blaize shiek and louie conn would join their cheerleading roster for the 2025 season.

Article Title: “The divorce is coming”: Travis Hunter’s wife Leanna Lenee’s tearful video sparks concern about their marriage just weeks after their wedding
Article Text:
Travis Hunter's wife's Leanna Lenee's video has sparked panic.(Image via Getty Images)

Travis Hunter’s wife, Leanna Lenee’s video has fans convinced that the two are “divorcing” soon, just days after they got married at a beautiful wedding in Tennessee





Fans feel Travis Hunter's marriage to Leanna Lenee is coming to an end.(Image via X)

Travis Hunter’s wife, Leanna Lenee, has issued a statement amid all the mess and divorce rumours about them



FAQs

When did Travis Hunter propose to Leanna Lenee? Travis Hunter proposed to Leanna Lenee in February 2024 Where did Travis Hunter and Leanna Lenee get married? Travis Hunter and Leanna Lenee tied the knot in Tennessee

Travis Hunter, the Jacksonville Jaguars’ rookie, recently tied the knot with his wife, Leanna Lenee, after years of dating her. While there has been a lot of criticism around their relationship, Travis Hunter has always defended Leanna Lenee. But now, a recent video of Travis Hunter’s wife Leanna Lenee crying on camera has raised eyebrows among fans.A few hours ago, a video of Travis Hunter’s wife, Leanna Lenee, had gone viral where she was crying and looked visibly shaken. It seemed Leanna Lenee was in the shower as she had her towel wrapped around her body and this had sparked panic among fans.A fan by the username @YahisMyReward took to X and wrote, “Women that record themselves crying have ulterior motives.”Another fan by the username @Mpthreepc wrote, “Shes awful.She won't even pretend for two years lol”, while a third fan by the username @jplfit posted, “Keep in mind fellas, the signs are always there. If we ignore the signs, we will pay the price.”Another fan by the username @ajs2fast4nos commented, “Whomever didn’t see this divorce coming after we all saw no prenup… well bunch of blind people. She’s a gold digger”.Another fan by the username @B1GSniper wrote, “Trav please broski 🙇🏽‍♂️ she is for the mf internet.Leave this b*tch right where you found her a*s. Attention is one hell of a drug.”However, Leanna Lenee has responded to all the speculations. Apparently, this video is from December 2024 and has recently resurfaced.Recently, Travis Hunter’s wife, Leanna Lenee, took to her social media and wrote, “I wish I could go back and hug December me."Leanna Lenee added, “I don't even recognize this girl anymore. The amount you can grow and develop in just 6 months of devoting your life to Jesus and getting away from the shackles of the world and social media is truly astounding.”Travis Hunter has remained silent amid all the mess and is focusing on prepping for the upcoming season of the NFL.Also Read: “She is surely ready to marry him”: Taylor Swift reportedly sees a future with Travis Kelce after he proved his love during a difficult time
Article Summary: Travis hunter's wife's leanna lenee's video has sparked panic. Fans convinced that the two are “divorcing” soon, just days after they got married at a beautiful wedding in tennessee. Travis hunter has remained silent amid all the mess and is focusing on prepping for the upcoming nfl season.

Article Title: What led everyone to believe Odell Beckham Jr. was retiring?
Article Text:
(Image via Getty: Odell Beckham Jr.)

Wide receiver Odell Beckham Jr.’s seventeen Instagram snapshots

A photo of Odell Beckham Jr. dressed in workout clothes, staring at the gridiron with his right hand carrying the NFL Duke.

A snapshot that captured him running on the field.

Two photographers photographed the wideout running with the ball.

A quote picture: “Let people doubt you.”

A snapshot of the wide receiver squatting and scoring a touchdown.

An overhead shot where Beckham Jr. looks lost in thought.

Odell is posing with Baltimore Ravens wideout Zay Flowers, Cincinnati Bengals wide receiver Ja’Marr Chase, and running back for Chicago Bears D’Andre Swift on the gridiron.

Video of American rapper and singer, Kevin Gates, quoting - “The beautiful thing about mistakes is it’s okay for people to see you make a mistake, just don’t ever let a m***erf***er see you quit. You are gonna watch me make mistakes, but you ain’t gonna ever watch me quit. - The Marathon Continues.”

The WR engaged in a training photoshoot.

Wide receiver is captured running on a treadmill.

A quote picture: “The right doors won’t open for you until you’re the version of yourself that’s supposed to walk through them.”

Another Odell training photoshoot - this time featuring his trainer.

Beckham Jr. is taking up a gasping pose with his hands on his knees.

A quote picture: “The next 5 months of 2025 are going to be non-stop wins for you…”

Wideout photographed counting seconds for his plank pose.

The WR is flaunting his six-pack abs in a monochrome photo.

A video of an American rapper and record producer, Lil Boosie, quoting - “They wanna see you down. They don’t like it when you are still smiling. And I know that. So I gotta be strong for that too. I ain’t gonna let these m***erf***ers think they got the best of me, even if they’re getting the best of me. Strong will. Let them know you’re not breaking me, man.”

Fans aired their views on hearing about Odell Beckham Jr.’s retirement news

How did Odell Beckham Jr. brush off his retirement rumors?

Also Read:

Social media post interpretation is a double-edged sword. One post can lead to so many unwanted interpretations - Like Odell Beckham Jr.’s recent Instagram post. The 32-year-old wide receiver, who last played for the Miami Dolphins, shared a series of snapshots on his Instagram. The post contained a total of seventeen snapshots!Now, a fake X account of a renowned NFL Insider, Adam Schefter, supposedly concluded from Beckham Jr.’s seventeen snapshots that he was retiring. The fake X account said that Odell was retiring. This wasn’t the case. His seventeen snapshots were not going to put a lid on his NFL career. An IG user even commented on the post, clearing the air, “I hate when you post this every preseason hahahahaga.” But somehow, the post led everyone to believe Odell Beckham Jr. ’s retirement rumors! What was so suspicious in those snapshots? What was the misleading caption? Let’s find out.The former wide receiver for the Baltimore Ravens captioned these seventeen snapshots as: “I just been in the cuts getting it in… gotta write the ending to my own story. Gods plan.” Following this caption and the series of snapshots, a fake account of Adam Schefter released a retirement rumor via X on August 12.It read: “After 10 seasons in the NFL, Odell Beckham Jr. has decided to retire. Beckham Jr. played for the Giants, Browns, Rams, Ravens, and Dolphins. He announced Tuesday.” It amassed 4 million views! Over 1K comments, 5.2K reposts, 74K likes, and 1.5K bookmarks. How did the fans react to this fake announcement?One fan felt sympathetic for Odell, saying, “Bro loved playing in NY and we let him go for peanuts.” Another fan questioned: “Was Odell Beckham overrated?” A third fan supposedly summed up his 10-year-long career, “His career consists of one great catch, a whack hairstyle, and tantrums on the sidelines LOL.” A fourth fan went back in time and blamed the Browns, “Cleveland f**ked his Career up.” The wideout played for them for three seasons - from 2019 to 2021. A fifth fan commented, “Most overrated overhyped player in recent history.”A day later, after his retirement rumors had run amok, on August 13, Beckham Jr., a former wide receiver for the Los Angeles Rams, wrote on his X: “No seriously. Plz stop reading everything on the internet, and stop texting me happy retirement b4 u piss me off 😭😭😭. That will get no response. I promise u the day I’m done I will let u kno. Again if u text me happy retirement im just gon have to block u😭😭. Thanks.” This X post too garnered 2.7 million views! 4.1K comments, 2.1K reposts, 26K likes, and 670+ bookmarks.
Article Summary: Odell beckham jr. shared a series of snapshots on his instagram. The post contained a total of seventeen snapshots! A fake x account of a renowned nfl insider, adam schefter, supposedly concluded from beckham jr’s seventeen snapshots that he was retiring. This wasn’t the case.

Article Title: 'Only gonna get worse' - Michael Porter Jr. makes scary remark about NBA gambling amidst his brother’s investigation
Article Text:
Michael Porter Jr. makes scary remark about NBA gambling amidst his brother’s investigation (Image Credit: Getty Images)

Michael Porter Jr. goes candid talking about gambling habit in NBA players including his brother Jontay

Michael Porter Jr. On NBA Players Gambling And Being Traded To The Nets!

Michael Porter Jr. talked about vices while discussing Jontay’s gambling habit

Michael Porter Jr opens up on women being his vice and Jontay's being gambling

Michael Porter Jr. recently spoke his heart out while discussing the prevalent problem of gambling among NBA players. He appeared on the One Night with Steiny podcast to reveal how gambling has penetrated the NBA world. The Brooklyn Nets forward gave a full account of how the speculation grapples the players owing to its addictive nature and promise of quick money. Making a startling revelation about the gambling condition, he warned that it is ‘only gonna get worse.’Porter Jr. also tried to defend his brother, Jontay, amidst the ongoing high-profile gambling scandal investigation. He made a candid confession, saying Jontay has gambling as his vice. Apart from talking on the podcast, Porter Jr. released a vlog where he made emotional confessions about his vices.Betting in the NBA is a big concern for everybody, including Michael Porter Jr., whose brother is facing investigation due to involvement in betting. Porter Jr. made a concerning remark on how sports gambling is getting worse, and how it is put into practice. He said, ''The integrity of the game, the sports gambling stuff can affect that a lot.''Porter Jr. elaborated on how players get attracted to the idea of winning quick money by merely following some game-changing tactics.He said, talking about players who get trapped in gambling, ''They come from nothing, and all their homies have nothing. And they're like, bro, if I come out of this game after three minutes and y'all all hit on my under, we're all getting a little bag.''Speaking further on how players, including his brother, are affected by the gambling addiction, Porter Jr. said, ''Obviously, my brother went through his situation. Malik Beasley's going through a situation right now. Terry Rozier was in some hot water. But the whole sports gambling entity, it's bad and it's only gonna get worse.''Michael Porter Jr. released a vlog recently where he spoke about vices. While he confessed that women were his vice, he said that his brother, Jontay, had gambling as his vice. Here is what Porter Jr. said about his brother’s addiction to gambling:“My brother, Jontay, he didn't struggle with that vice (women). I didn't struggle with gambling addiction. I never struggle with that vice. God gave me a lot of money cuz he figured I could handle it and not lose myself in that area. And maybe Jontay, he was not blessed with tons of money because he struggled with that area of the idolization of money. I have not been blessed with a wife because maybe I am not prepared to handle that because of my struggles. ”As per Porter Jr., his brother’s inability to manage funds pushed him into gambling. The revelation threw light on various vulnerabilities that the NBA players struggle with.Jontay Porter received a lifetime ban from the NBA owing to his involvement in high-stakes prop bets. He pleaded guilty to the same and said he did it to come out of gambling debts, as per a report by AP News. In January 2025, CBS Sports released a court document that detailed how Jontay texted a co-conspirator to help bettors gain from prop bets.Also Read: “Took a nap afterwards” - Michael Porter Jr. gets candid after his departure from Nikola Jokic’s team
Article Summary: Brooklyn nets forward michael porter jr. spoke his heart out while discussing the prevalent problem of gambling among nba players. He made a startling revelation about the gambling condition, he warned that it is ‘only gonna get worse’ he also tried to defend his brother, jontay, amidst the ongoing high-profile gambling scandal investigation.

Article Title: Arda Turan’s awkward post-match interview with Daria Bondar Savina sparks viral social media reaction
Article Text:
Arda Turan’s awkward post-match interview with Daria Bondar Savina sparks viral social media reaction (Image via Getty)

Arda Turan avoids eye contact with Daria Bondar Savina after Shakhtar Donetsk's victory

Shakhtar Donetsk head coach Arda Turan is in the spotlight for more than his team’s victory. After Shakhtar Donetsk beat Besiktas in the UEFA Europa League second qualifying round in Istanbul on July 28, 2025, people are talking about Arda Turan’s very awkward post-match interview. The 38-year-old manager could hardly look at the club’s reporter, Daria Bondar Savina, and it was clear he did not want to meet her eyes even for a second.When Arda Turan spoke with Daria Bondar Savina after the match, his actions looked very odd. He looked to the ground, fidgeted, and turned away from the camera, making sure not to look at Daria Bondar Savina.She is 24, and is known not only as the team’s reporter but also for her striking presence. Videos of Arda Turan’s behavior soon went viral on social media. Many fans noticed how hard he was trying not to look at the reporter.Some comments popped up online.One person wrote, “full of red flags no?.”Another said, “Arda TuranHe's trying so hard to keep his eyes off her body. Congratulations, he's a loyal man.”Someone else wrote, “Because he hasn't grown up and he hasn't learnt how to control himself.”“Sick ideology,” another fan commented.“Go back to the sandbox, IDIOT!!!!!,” wrote another user.“I hope he doesn't has a toxic wife,” another user commented.Daria Bondar Savina’s marriage to Valeriy Bondar adds to Arda Turan’s careful behaviorThe story takes another twist because Daria Bondar Savina is married to Valeriy Bondar, a Shakhtar Donetsk player. This may also explain why Arda Turan, who is new to his job at Shakhtar Donetsk, was acting even more careful with his words and actions around her.Also Read: Leylah Fernandez shares surprising dating news ahead of Cincinnati Open Arda Turan, a former Barcelona and Turkey star, started coaching Shakhtar earlier this summer after a good run coaching Eyupspor in Turkey.Arda Turan got married to Aslihan Dogan Turan in Istanbul in March 2018. People online guessed that Arda Turan’s loyalty to his wife, because of some old rumors, made him even more careful.During both interviews with Daria Bondar Savina, Arda Turan seemed focused on staying professional and not causing trouble for himself on or off the field. Still, his awkward interviews have become a popular topic among football fans everywhere.
Article Summary: Shakhtar donetsk beat besiktas 1-0 in uefa europa league second qualifying round. Arda turan gave an awkward post-match interview with the team's reporter, daria bondar savina. Videos of the manager's behavior soon went viral on social media.

Article Title: Dwyane Wade shares a glimpse of daddy’s day-out with his daughter Kaavia
Article Text:
Dwyane Wade with Kaavia and Gabrille Union-Wade, Image via Instagram

Dwyane Wade shares a sneak peek of his day out with daughter Kaavia

Dwyane Wade reveals being amazed by his daughter Kaavia’s curiosity

Making the NBA, Dwyane’s All-Star Spades & Fatherhood

Former NBA legend Dwyane Wade is a total family man. From going on vacations to posting pictures with his wife Gabrielle Union-Wade and daughter Kaavia, Wade defines what being a perfect partner and dad looks like. The Miami Heat's alum recently shared a sneak peek of his day out with daughter Kaavia. According to Dwyane Wade, he gets updated with all the kids drama during his time with his little daughter.After going on a beach getaway with his actor wife Gabrielle Union-Wade, Dwyane Wade spent some quality time with daughter Kaavia. According to a clip posted by the former NBA legend on his Instagram handle, Kaavia was busy updating him about the kids drama. Wade posted the clip as,“Our walks and our car rides are the moments that I get caught up on all of the kid drama.”Kaavia was spotted talking about her friends, and updating her athlete dad about her little circle. Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union-Wade welcomed Kaavia in November 2018 via surrogacy. Kaavia is almost a permanent face on Wade’s social media handles and even shares a crazy fan following on Instagram.During an episode of Dwyane Wade’s podcast back in March 2025, the NBA legend opened up on fatherhood. While talking about his little daughter, Wade revealed Kaavia loves throwing curveballs at him which leaves him totally surprised. He said,“I’m like, you are six! She feels that she’s supposed to get that answer.The things that my six-year-old daughter has asked me already, I don’t know what the future gon’ be like with me and her. Everything is on the table.”Wade’s little daughter Kaavia has a prominent social media presence. With a fan following of over 1 million on Instagram, she is no less than a star. Reportedly, the account is managed by Dwyane Wade and his actor wife Gabrielle Union-Wade.Also Read: NBA icon Dwyane Wade recaps his July moments filled with beach vibes, family and gratitude
Article Summary: Dwyane wade shares a sneak peek of his day out with daughter kaavia. The miami heat's alum recently shared a video of his time with his little daughter. Dwyane wade and gabrielle union-wade welcomed kaavia in november 2018 via surrogacy.

Article Title: "Reputational damages I’ve endured"- Anthony Edwards faces $500K demand from Ayesha Howard amid heated custody battle
Article Text:
Anthony Edwards and his ex are currently having issues (Image via Ayesha Howard/Instagram; Issac Baldizon/NBAE via Getty)

Ayesha Howard accuses NBA star of causing financial and reputational harm during ongoing custody dispute

Anthony Edwards is an NBA pro (Image via Getty Images)

One of the NBA's talented athletes, Anthony Edwards , is currently in the middle of a court fight with his ex-girlfriend, Ayesha Howard . She recently requested a hefty amount, i.e. $500,000, and a public apology, which has ignited the ongoing court case between the NBA professional and the singer. Us Weekly reported that this is separate from whatever paternity or child support arrangements they might eventually agree on about their child, Aubri's care.Last October, Anthony Edwards ’ now ex-girlfriend, Ayesha Howard, gave birth to their daughter. The two have since found themselves in a bitter custody battle that seems to have recently escalated.US Weekly claimed that the social media influencer has made a list of demands of the NBA star player. This includes a public apology and a hefty one-time payout of $500,000.The singer wanted to make her point clear as she told the reporters:“I want to make it clear that my request for compensation was never tied to agreeing to any custody orders. I asked for compensation due to the substantial financial and reputational damages I’ve endured during this prolonged litigation with Anthony Edwards.”Apart from the monetary damages, she is also requesting a formal declaration from the Minnesota Timberwolves player to correct his reported statements.She also claimed that those are allegedly "false and defamatory or misleading statements" about her personal conduct. The motion was filed in the Los Angeles Superior Court on August 6.However, it took a messy turn after each side started blaming the other for being slow to act. According to court documents, the singer has not yet signed the custody arrangement that a judge initially mandated in May. She even accused the NBA star of being heartless and allegedly advising her to get an abortion.Records show that after Ayesha Howard reportedly verbally attacked Anthony Edwards multiple times, and published alleged text exchanges supporting her accounts of their relationship.She also requested a non-disparagement clause in the original form of the agreement. Additionally, she further requested limitations on sharing images of their child on social media. Both of those petitions were contested by Anthony Edwards’ legal team.Also read: Where does Johnny Juzang hail from? Former Utah Jazz guard joins Minnesota Timberwolves for one year
Article Summary: Anthony edwards and his ex are currently having issues. Ayesha howard accuses nba star of causing financial and reputational harm during ongoing custody dispute. She recently requested a hefty amount, i.e. $500,000, and a public apology, which has ignited the ongoing court case.

Article Title: Rob Gronkowski Plays an Ideal Boyfriend As His Girl Camille Kostek Steps Into a New Chapter
Article Text:
Camille Kostek makes a new career move: Image via IG

Camille Kostek kick-started a new career

Debuting for the first time, Camille Collection Resorts. We’re getting red and ice blue, and Rob will debut one of the men’s short

s,”

Wait till the end. My modeling career just started!”

Rob Gronkowski and Camille Kostek’s latest appearance sparked a new controversy

Also read:

Rob Gronkowski and Camille Kostek never shied away from flexing their sweetest relationship to the world. The retired NFL player and the former New England Patriots cheerleader met each other during a charity event back in 2013. Even before that, they had shared the same field several times during Patriots games but never got a chance to lock eyes. However, after one of Rob’s teammates gave Kostek his phone number written on a T-shirt, the two quickly struck up a deep romance and never looked back. But Kostek, 33, didn’t just live on her boyfriend’s fame. She has built her own empire, rather. The renowned swimsuit model is now ready to expand her horizons.The lady has collaborated with elite swimwear brand LA PORTE and launched her own Spring/Summer 2024 Capsule Collection. LA PORTE and Camille then hosted their first-ever NYC Pop-Up in SoHo. Camille stepped into the event with her boyfriend by her side and immediately stole the show. Both of them stunned the fans in sleek and hot swimsuit pairs. “the sensational model let her excitement out.The NFL superstar shared the updates in his Instagram story with the caption, “Now, this is what we call a perfect venture partner (read adventure). However, that’s not just it. Fans go beyond just their star presence, professional pursuits, and the latest business move to solely focus on the swirling speculation over Camille’s pregnancy.Yes. You heard you right. Gronkowski and Kostek cropped up at the event in the hottest avatars, while fans didn’t unsee a little bump on her belly. Kostek looked mesmerizing in a snow-white gown, dancing alongside her beau, but her tummy had all the spotlight. People were even seen rejoicing over an assumed addition to their family soon.The couple is known to keep things a little private until it’s time. They secretly dated each other for a couple of years before making their relationship public back in 2015. They, in fact, don’t have a lot of cute couple pictures on their feed. So, they might keep a pregnancy close to their chest. But fans should be aware that it’s still speculation.
Article Summary: Camille kostek, 33, has launched her own range of luxury swimwear. The former new england patriots cheerleader and nfl star rob gronkowski have been dating for two years. Fans are speculating that camille is pregnant with their first child.

Article Title: Shedeur Sanders out with oblique injury; Browns’ QB room faces major setback
Article Text:
Shedeur Sanders sidelined by oblique injury (Image via: Getty Images)

Shedeur Sanders' oblique injury escalates Cleveland Browns’ quarterback preseason troubles



Cleveland Browns backup QB battle continues with Pickett Gabriel and Tyler Huntley in spotlight amid Sanders' injury



Cleveland Browns fans have been bracing for uncertainty at quarterback all preseason, and the latest setback only deepens the concern. Rookie Shedeur Sanders, who impressed in his preseason debut, has suffered an oblique injury during practice, adding to previous hamstring issues for Kenny Pickett and Dillon Gabriel. With the regular season approaching, questions about the Browns’ starting QB and roster strategy are intensifying.Shedeur Sanders’ performance in the first preseason game had many fans hoping he could start in Week 1. Yet, the unofficial depth chart still lists him fourth, behind Dillon Gabriel—a move that has sparked debate among supporters and analysts. Head coach Kevin Stefanski had indicated Sanders would start the team’s second preseason game against the Eagles if Pickett and Gabriel were unavailable. Now, with Sanders sidelined for evaluation, that plan remains uncertain.The possibility of all three young quarterbacks being unavailable puts veteran Joe Flacco in the spotlight. At 40, Flacco is the most experienced option, though he has not taken part in preseason action. For a team in rebuilding mode, this presents a delicate balance to develop the younger quarterbacks with live reps or rely on Flacco’s steadiness to navigate the early weeks.Pickett appears to be the odd man out but could still make the roster if either Gabriel or Sanders is moved to the practice squad. Gabriel’s placement ahead of Sanders continues to baffle fans, while Tyler Huntley, brought in as preseason depth, is the most likely to be released unless he impresses in the remaining games.Also Read: Aaron Rodgers’ awkward ‘Joe Biden’ moment exposes his struggle to fit in with Steelers, and how Cam Heyward and I.J. Watt stepped in Stefanski has stressed the importance of evaluating backup quarterbacks before final roster decisions. With Shedeur Sanders’ injury, Tyler Huntley may see significant playing time in Cleveland’s second of only three preseason games. The Browns’ quarterback room is facing its toughest test yet, and how the team navigates these injuries could shape their Week 1 lineup and season trajectory.
Article Summary: Shedeur sanders sidelined by oblique injury during practice. Kenny pickett and dillon gabriel have also suffered hamstring injuries. Coach kevin stefanski has stressed the importance of evaluating backup quarterbacks. Tyler huntley may see significant playing time in cleveland’s second of only three preseason games.

Article Title: Jeff Blashill to lead Chicago Blackhawks NHL team with major focus on young talent, player development, and winning culture
Article Text:
Jeff Blashill hopes to shape Chicago Blackhawks’ young roster into winners (Image via: Getty Images)

Jeff Blashill’s NHL career and coaching approach to developing young talent



Jeff Blashill Introductory Press Conference | Chicago Blackhawks

Chicago Blackhawks training camp and rookie evaluations to build competitive NHL roster

Jeff Blashill is set to lead Chicago Blackhawks, focusing on developing the team’s young roster and building a culture of competitiveness. With an emphasis on player growth, fundamentals, and long-term success, Blashill aims to transform potential into performance, guiding the NHL franchise toward sustained progress and giving fans a clear sense of the team’s future direction.Blashill brings extensive NHL experience, having spent three seasons as an assistant with Tampa Bay and seven years as head coach of the Detroit Red Wings (2015–2022). In Detroit, he led the team to the playoffs in his first season but missed postseason play in subsequent years, finishing with a record of 204-261-72 over 537 games. His focus on fundamentals and player development aligns with the Blackhawks’ current emphasis on nurturing young talent.Speaking ahead of the 2026 season, Blashill emphasized the importance of growth: “The reality is our growth will be based on how quickly our young guys mature. Not only how they mature physically, but more importantly, how their games mature.”Training camp, scheduled for September 15–19, 2025, will introduce Blashill’s system. Rookies participating in the Tom Kurvers Prospect Tournament in Minnesota will arrive early for workouts and evaluations.On-ice sessions will focus on smart skating, puck control, rapid transitions, and explosive first steps—key skills for both defensive recovery and generating offensive opportunities.“It shows how willing our team is to work. And it’s one of the best ways to create transition offense—being smothering in your effort to come back as forwards. That allows your defensemen to gap up, create turnovers, and go the other way,” Blashill explained.Also Read: Trophy over Wifey: Brad Marchand reveals true priority as he kisses Stanley Cup before wife in Florida Panthers celebration; Wife later reacts With a young and developing roster, implementing these systems will be challenging, but Jeff Blashill’s emphasis on fundamentals, player growth, and cultural transformation could help cultivate a competitive NHL team.
Article Summary: Blashill brings extensive nhl experience, having spent three seasons as an assistant with tampa bay and seven years as head coach of the detroit red wings. Training camp, scheduled for september 15–19, 2025, will introduce blashill’s system. Rookies participating in the tom kurvers prospect tournament in minnesota will arrive early for workouts.

Article Title: Florida Panthers face an uncertain situation with Matthew Tkachuk’s surgery
Article Text:
FILE - Florida Panthers left wing Matthew Tkachuk (19) against the Tampa Bay Lightning during the first period in Game 5 of an NHL hockey Stanley Cup first-round playoff series, April 30, 2025, in Tampa, Fla. (AP Photo/Chris O'Meara, File)

Florida Panthers’ Matthew Tkachuk remains undecided on surgery decision after 4 Nations face-off injury

DEVELOPING: Matthew Tkachuk "Undecided" on getting surgery + Should the Cats wait to extend Mikkola?

What will happen to Tkachuk’s surgery now?

Also Read

The NHL’s Florida Panthers are in an uncertain situation with Matthew Tkachuk’s surgery. As per reports, Tkachuk has suffered a torn muscle, which could sideline him for months, impacting the team's next season. In case of his absence, the Panthers might use long-term injured reserve. However, it has now come to light that Florida Panthers star forward has revealed that he is still weighing whether to undergo surgery for a torn adductor muscle, a move that could keep him out for the first two or even three months of the 2025–26.Florida Panthers star forward Matthew Tkachuk remains undecided on whether to undergo surgery after sustaining a torn adductor during the recent 4 Nations face-off tournament. The injury, first revealed after the event, has sparked concern among fans, but the Panthers appear to be taking a long-term approach to his recovery.According to NHL Insider Frank Seravalli, Tkachuk could be away from game action for 3-5 months, assuming he gets the surgery. This could keep him out for a significant portion of the upcoming regular season. While that might sound alarming to their fans, who are eagerly waiting to see the Panthers’ top scorer back on the ice.Reports suggest that the team’s strategy and the broader league context suggest there’s more to the story.When it comes to Tkachuk, the choice between putting off surgery or going ahead with it now will probably depend on the medical team's advice and the team's hopes for the playoffs. With Florida chasing an incredible third straight Stanley Cup , there’s really no rush to get him back on the ice.Fans might have to be patient and wait a few months to see their star forward again, but if past experiences tell us anything, the Panthers are in it for the long haul, and Tkachuk’s return could be perfectly timed for another thrilling event.
Article Summary: Florida panthers star forward matthew tkachuk remains undecided on whether to undergo surgery after sustaining a torn adductor during the recent 4 nations face-off tournament. The panthers appear to be taking a long-term approach to his recovery. This could keep him out for a significant portion of the upcoming regular season.
